sense.def:
A clamp
je priprava, ki trdno spaja dva predmeta.

Kadar človek
clamps one thing to another
, dva predmeta pritrdi skupaj s sponko.

seg.quote: ...trays that were clamped to the arm of a chair.

sense.def:
To clamp something in a particular place
pomeni nekaj odločno in trdno nekam postaviti.

seg.quote: He picked up his bowler hat and clamped it upon his head.

sense.def:
To clamp down on something
pomeni nekaj ustaviti ali nadzorovati.

seg.quote: The authorities have got to clamp down on these trouble-makers.
